{{ddcl|
enum event { erase_event, imbue_event, copyfmt_event };
}}

Specifies the event type which is passed to functions registered by {{lc|register_callback()}} on specific events. The following constants are defined:

{{dsc begin}}
{{dsc hitem|Constant|Explanation}}
{{dsc|{{tt|erase_event}}|issued on {{lc|~ios_base()}} or {{ltt|cpp/io/basic_ios/copyfmt|basic_ios::copyfmt()}} (before the copy of members takes place)}}
{{dsc|{{tt|imbue_event}}|issued on {{lc|imbue()}}}}
{{dsc|{{tt|copyfmt_event}}|issued on {{ltt|cpp/io/basic_ios/copyfmt|basic_ios::copyfmt()}} (after the copy of members takes place, but before the exception settings are copied)}}
{{dsc end}}
